name: Gift Arena
description:
Gift Arena

Made with the Godot engine

Battle 1 on 1 with a friend to give gifts to each other. Walk over gifts to pick them up, then throw them at the other player. Whichever player gives the most gifts before the time runs out wins!

Currently, Player 1 is played with a mouse and keyboard while Player 2 is played with a gamepad (xbox, playstation, or other).
